main_text:
Second Kind of Position in Feminist Environmental Philosophy: Ecofeminist Philosophy
3. Second Kind of Position in Feminist Environmental Philosophy: Ecofeminist Philosophy
We already have been introduced to ecofeminist philosophy in connection
with animal ethics (Section 2.2),
Leopold's Land Ethic 
(Section 2.3), and deep ecology
 (Section 2.4). This section explores
 the nature of ecofeminist philosophy
as a distinct kind of environmental philosophy.
section_title: 3. Second Kind of Position in Feminist Environmental Philosophy: Ecofeminist Philosophy
